trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a control designer requires a preview instance of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Indica se um designer de controle requer uma instância de versão prévia do controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute to a control designer class to indicate the type of preview control that is supported by the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> atributo a uma classe do designer de controle para indicar o tipo de controle de visualização que é compatível com o designer de controle.

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to change a preview control for design-time rendering without affecting the actual persisted instance of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Use esse atributo para alterar um controle de visualização para renderização de tempo de design sem afetar a instância real persistente do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> when declaring a custom designer class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você especifica o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> quando declarando uma classe do designer personalizada que é derivada de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute determines the behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> atributo determina o comportamento para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> membros na base de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time HTML.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade `true` para indicar que o designer usa uma cópia temporária do controle associado para gerar o HTML de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: As alterações no controle temporária não são persistentes.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property to `false` to indicate that the designer returns the control instance, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property, from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade `false` para indicar que o designer retorna a instância de controle, especificamente o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> propriedade, do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the control object are persisted.
trans-unit.target: As alterações para o objeto de controle são persistentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner> class is marked with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner> classe está marcada com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The designer uses the preview control with the automatic style formatting task, which allows the user to preview various autoformat stylesthat can be applied to the calendar.
trans-unit.target: O designer usa o controle de visualização com o estilo automático tarefa formatação, o que permite que o usuário a visualizar várias stylesthat de AutoFormatação pode ser aplicada para o calendário.

trans-unit.source: As the user selects different autoformat styles in the user interface, the selected style scheme is applied to the preview control.
trans-unit.target: O usuário selecionar estilos de formatação automática diferente na interface do usuário, o esquema de estilo selecionado é aplicado ao controle de visualização.

trans-unit.source: Applying a new style to the preview control does not change the scheme that is applied to the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar um novo estilo para o controle de visualização não altera o esquema é aplicado à instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> controle no designer.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> is not specified in the control designer declaration, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> behavior is equivalent to specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> as `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> não for especificado na declaração do designer de controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> comportamento é equivalente a especificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> como `false`.

trans-unit.source: Designer classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members, and ignore the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Designers classes derivadas do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> membros e ignorar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: To determine the expected behavior for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>, see the reference documentation for the derived control designer class.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o comportamento esperado para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>, consulte a documentação de referência para a classe derivada de controle do designer.

trans-unit.source: For general information about using attributes, see [Attributes Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a4daf212-2410-423d-a800-7a08864e9bff) and [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações gerais sobre o uso de atributos, consulte [visão geral de atributos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a4daf212-2410-423d-a800-7a08864e9bff) e [atributos](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about design-time attributes, see [Attributes and Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7aed9eb4-124b-4a15-a0a3-458f37ac9ef7).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre atributos de tempo de design, consulte [suporte de tempo de Design e atributos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7aed9eb4-124b-4a15-a0a3-458f37ac9ef7).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to mark a control designer with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como marcar um designer de controle com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: The code example derives an ASP.NET server control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> class and associates the ASP.NET server control with a custom control designer implementation.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código deriva de um controle de servidor do ASP.NET de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> classe e associa o controle de servidor ASP.NET com uma implementação de designer do controle personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The control designer class declaration is marked with the `SupportsPreviewControl` attribute set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A declaração de classe do designer de controle está marcada com o `SupportsPreviewControl` atributo definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The control designer overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method and encloses the design-time HTML for the control in italic tags.
trans-unit.target: O designer de controle substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método e inclui o tempo de design HTML para o controle em itálico marcas.

trans-unit.source: The initial value to assign for <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor inicial a ser atribuído para <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> class and sets the initial value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> e define o valor inicial da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> class directly.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você não precisa criar uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> classe diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> to the class declaration of the custom control designer in the source code.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> à declaração de classe do designer de controle personalizado no código-fonte.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> class that is set to the default preview value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> definida como o valor de versão prévia padrão.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default> field is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default> campo é definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> method to determine whether the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property is set to the default preview value.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> método para determinar se o valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade é definida como o valor padrão de visualização.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com a instância de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object represents the same preview attribute setting as the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado representa a mesma configuração de atributo de versão prévia que a instância atual da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> attribute and its value is the same as this instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> for um atributo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> e seu valor for o mesmo que o dessa instância de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A> method overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A> substituições de método de <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A> method compares two instances based on the value of their <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A> método compara duas instâncias com base no valor de suas <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para esta instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code for the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash inteiro com sinal de 32 bits para a instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.GetHashCode%2A> method overrides the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.GetHashCode%2A> substituições de método de <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.GetHashCode%2A> method generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.GetHashCode%2A> método gera o mesmo código de hash de dois objetos são iguais de acordo com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The hash code is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures, such as hash tables.
trans-unit.target: O código hash é adequado para uso em algoritmos e estruturas de dados, como tabelas de hash de hash.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> class is set to the default preview attribute value.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a instância atual da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> é definida como o valor padrão do atributo de versão prévia.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> is equal to the default preview attribute value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> for igual ao valor padrão do atributo de versão prévia; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> method compares the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> object with the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default> field.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> método compara o valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> objeto com o valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade estática <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default> campo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control designer requires a temporary preview control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer de controle requer um controle de versão prévia temporário em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control for design-time preview; <see langword="false" /> if the designer uses an instance of the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component" /> control that is contained in the designer.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o designer usa uma cópia temporária do controle associado para visualização de tempo de design. <see langword="false" /> se o designer usa uma instância do <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component" /> controle que está contido no designer.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property by applying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute to a custom designer class declaration.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você pode especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade aplicando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> atributo a uma declaração de classe personalizada do designer.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute determines the behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> atributo determina o comportamento para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> membros na base de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time HTML.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade `true` para indicar que o designer usa uma cópia temporária do controle associado para gerar o HTML de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: As alterações no controle temporária não são persistentes.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property to `false` to indicate that the designer returns the control instance, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property, from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> propriedade `false` para indicar que o designer retorna a instância de controle, especificamente o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> propriedade, do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Changes to the control object are persisted.
trans-unit.target: As alterações para o objeto de controle são persistentes.
